sentences.sContent: A lone figure was standing at the bus stop.
sentences.sCn: 公交车站上站着一个孤单的身影。

sentences.sContent: He was by no means a lone voice criticizing the government.
sentences.sCn: 批评政府的绝不止他一个人。

sentences.sContent: the lone survivor of a shipwreck
sentences.sCn: 一次海难的唯一幸存者

synos.tran: 单身的；独自的；寂寞的；人迹稀少的

words.tran: 孤独的人；不合群的动物

trans.tranOther: used to talk about the only person or thing in a place, or the only person or thing that does something
